segments.text: Hello , I brought a lap-top computer with me . Do you know how can I use the internet in my room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , right now , we can't afford internet use in the rooms . But you can go to the web bar in our hotel . It's on the 12 floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I think I will go there .
segments.speaker: S1
